person.persName: Oscar Turner, Sr. (Ballard County, Kentucky, attorney and planter)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, attorney and planter. New Orleans, Louisiana, native. Son of Fielding Lewis Turner and Caroline Sargent Turner. Married to Eugenia Caroline Gardner Turner in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on May 20, 1855. Father of Henry Turner and Lily Turner. Resident of Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1826. Resident of Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1843. Graduated from Transylvania University in Lexington, Kentucky, in 1847. Attorney in Ballard County in 1850. Owned twenty-nine enslaved persons in Ballard County in 1850. Commonwealth's attorney for the First Judicial District of Kentucky from 1851 to 1855. Planter in Ballard County in 1860. Owned forty-seven enslaved persons in Ballard County in 1860.
